name: Terra Lago
description: Terra Lago is a master-planned community featuring a scenic lake, golf course, and clubhouse. With beautiful homes, many offering lakefront views, this neighborhood provides a resort-like lifestyle in a serene desert setting.

name: Shadow Hills
description: Shadow Hills is a gated community offering a serene atmosphere, spacious homes, and lush landscaping. Known for its peaceful environment, this neighborhood is perfect for those seeking upscale living in Indio.

name: Sun City Shadow Hills
description: Sun City Shadow Hills is a 55+ active adult community offering resort-style living with amenities like golf courses, pools, tennis courts, and a fitness center. This vibrant neighborhood fosters an active and social lifestyle for its residents.

name: Indian Palms Country Club
description: Indian Palms Country Club is a historic community offering condos and single-family homes. Known for its rich golfing heritage, the neighborhood features a clubhouse, pools, and tennis courts, creating a vibrant and comfortable lifestyle.

name: Trilogy at The Polo Club
description: Trilogy at The Polo Club is an upscale, gated community designed for active adults. Featuring modern homes and resort-style amenities such as a clubhouse, fitness center, and pools, this neighborhood offers luxury and comfort.

name: Montage at Santa Rosa
description: Montage at Santa Rosa is a family-friendly neighborhood offering spacious single-family homes. Located near local attractions, it combines suburban comfort with a strong sense of community.

name: Desert Collection
description: Desert Collection is a gated community offering modern single-family homes with access to community amenities. Known for its secure and comfortable environment, it’s a great choice for families and professionals.

name: Foxstone
description: Foxstone is a residential neighborhood known for its well-maintained homes and family-friendly atmosphere. Offering a suburban lifestyle, it provides convenient access to schools, parks, and shopping centers.

name: Talavera
description: Talavera is a gated, family-oriented community featuring single-family homes with modern designs. The neighborhood is known for its parks, playgrounds, and a strong sense of community, making it ideal for families.

name: Las Brisas

name: Heritage Palms

description: Indian Springs Country Club is a gated community featuring single-family homes and condos surrounding a beautifully maintained golf course. With resort-style amenities and a welcoming atmosphere, it’s perfect for both families and retirees.
